tweets.text: Daily dose of poisonous hydrogen sulphide has arrived early in Hartshill-c5 miles from Walleys Landfill-today. Normally get gassed evening/night time. No chance we can go along with government COVID guidance to keep homes ventilated.  #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids

I've seen the stink from Walley's reported from inside Newcastle-under-Lyme @vuecinemas this evening as well as in other town centre locations.

This is exactly what was feared - why on earth weren't the additional requirements of the operator identified earlier? @EnvAgency

So construction sites can just dump and leave all their rubbish outside for weeks on end, saw a rat yesterday @medway_council @Kentroadsafety @PrideinMedway #medwaycouncil  #disgust https://t.co/HEEghlM3qg
@AaronBell4NUL @vuecinemas @EnvAgency Local businesses will be ruined for good if this isn't sorted soon, if they don't value lives maybe they can sort it for the local economy. #stopthestink

So much effort & expense into trying to catch someone  for not having a valid üé£ licence   Why can‚Äôt you be more proactive & put as much effort into walking our rivers & stopping & preventing pollution ? @EnvAgency How many unannounced inspections do you carry out ? https://t.co/sdveGwpbHe https://t.co/HVZEN0v3Y7

#StopTheStink: @PHE_uk and @EnvAgencyMids, since this is now a medium-term issue (90-days), why is the more stringent WHO tolerability of 20 Œºg m¬Ø¬≥ hydrogen sulphide not applied when considering respiratory effects? (Ref: Page 5 of https://t.co/0IJ1VGs9pk) https://t.co/tkqsRQ1FxM

The Council has been successful in its bid for funding from the Future High Streets Fund, the Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government has confirmed.

¬£11m has been secured.

More here: https://t.co/bLCrURc3R8

The local council has asked @MPGeorgeEustice for an enquiry into the @EnvAgency s mismanagement of the site,the leader stands with us at protests with the MP who has spoken forthrightly& taken this to parliament 3 times https://t.co/Gcbm6FmT4j actions forthcoming from govt! https://t.co/fmli5Rh2Mo

#StopTheStink https://t.co/NDvQCA2BSO
